Posts.Content: hi  i have  invasive ductal cancer  n it can not be cured as with my other health issues i canot have any treatment apart from hormone therapy. which they hope will control it.  i went for a mammagram n ultrascan yesterday to see if  there was any change n i found out that my lymphnode are swollen around the underarm pit n in the breast  i am  so very wirried  that the cancer  it spreading xx
